changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment:
Associate the "Silent Carrier for Alpha-Thalassemia" supplement with the pathogenic and likely pathogenic Alpha-Thalassemia templates.
Supplement ID (from HorizonDiseaseSupplement.xml) "Silent Carrier for Alpha-Thalassemia": 136
Template ID (from HorizonDiseaseResultTemplate.xml) PATHOGENIC: 139 LIKELY_PATHOGENIC: 140
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`horizondisease_horizondiseasesupplement` (`supplement_id`, `template_id`, `disease_id`) VALUES (136, 139, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'ATHAL')), (136, 140, (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'ATHAL'));
changeSet.rollback: DELETE FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease_horizondiseasesupplement` WHERE `supplement_id` = 136 AND `template_id` IN (139,140) AND `disease_id` = (SELECT `id` FROM `prodlims`.`horizondisease` WHERE `cloudId` = 'ATHAL');
